website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight towel with a microfiber design that will fold down to a small size for travel.
pros: More than a dozen colors and designs available with this towel
Microfiber design is perfect for situations in which you need the towel to dry quickly, such as at the beach
Will maintain its bright colors even after many uses and washes
cons: Design is smaller than some other beach towels at 32 inches x 68 inches

customer_reviews.title: Actually do dry fast in high humidity environments
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to go camping in Texas where it’s humid in the hopes that they wouldn’t mildew. They didn’t, they dried and they dried fast. I was shocked. One was dry in the morning after being left outside overnight which usually makes things more wet. Not only that but somehow they absorb water as well as my regular towel, are light, fold up relatively small, and they are soft. I didn’t even know they would have a little loop to make hanging them easy. I’m buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Ridgway

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Practical

customer_reviews.title: Soft, light towel. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: I needed 2 new beach towels for our upcoming vacation. I saw this microfiber material while searching and decided to try it. customer_reviews.title: Swim instructor highly recommends

This towel is light weight, and I only need 1 each night; whereas I used to need 2 heavy towels to make to the end of my lesson time. The color is very bright (I purchased the bright orange). I highly recommend this towel. It is easy to pack, extremely light weight, very absorbent, great color, and dries quickly.

customer_reviews.title: They really are sand-free! Great for tents & campers while at the beach!
customer_reviews.text: Took them with on a week-long trip to the beach, when we were using our little camper. I bought them because they promised to be sand-free, and I was hoping to minimize the amount of sand we would be tracking into the camper. Well, they worked! The sand was easy to shake off of them - I never felt like I was drying myself off using a piece of sandpaper. Also, hanging on the clothesline (or laid out on the beach), they dried relatively quickly (faster, if you hang them single thickness, not just throw them over the line). I would definitely recommend these towels!
customer_reviews.author: Terri Kempthorne

customer_reviews.title: They were compact and fit easily in our suitcase

We used these towels almost everyday at the beach and at the pool. I absolutely loved them. The sand was easily shaken off and it dried very quickly. The one time the towel was wet and sandy, I just ran it in the shower at hotel and hung to dry. Good as new in under and hour. I want to buy more of these.
